summary: An ordinance relating to the Park Department; providing for drainage, landscaping and planting, curbs and sidewalks on certain land surrounding the Seattle Historical Museum in Section 21, Township 25 North, Range 4 East; designated said area as an extension of Montlake Park; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund, declaring the emergency therefor, and cancelling the unexpended balance of an appropriation under Ordinance No. 79614.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
